TextView.android:text: Discover the gorgeously appointed Courtyard Bilaspur hotel in Chhattisgarh, India. Our hotel is perfectly located near the Bilaspur city center, where elegant restaurants and upscale shopping are available for your visiting pleasure. Our Chhattisgarh hotel boasts an immaculate lobby area and guest rooms, each outfitted with wireless high-speed Internet access to help you keep connected during your stay. Enjoy our four-star hotel's recreational facilities, including a fitness center and a stunning outdoor pool, and indulge in a delicious meal with family or friends at our MoMo Cafe.

Established in the year 2010, Hotel East Park in Bilaspur H O, Bilaspur-chhattisgarh is a top player in the category Hotels in the Bilaspur-chhattisgarh. This well-known establishment acts as a one-stop destination servicing customers both local and from other parts of Bilaspur-chhattisgarh. Over the course of its journey, this business has established a firm foothold in it’s industry. The belief that customer satisfaction is as important as their products and services, have helped this establishment garner a vast base of customers, which continues to grow by the day.

The Aananda Imperial Bilaspur is a 4 star luxury hotel in the heart of the city and has defined hospitality in the truest sense of the Indian tradition of “Atithi Devo Bhaba”. It is Eco friendly and is a full service hotel that has heralded a new standard of deliverance with responsibility in the hospitality scenario of Chattisgarh. It is an extremely business friendly hotel situated in a lively area and within short walking distance from the main business hub of Bilaspur. Also close by is a shopping mall and Movie Multiplex. The property is the preferred choice of accommodation for all travellers with guest satisfaction being achieved over and over again. Repeat footfall is the yardstick to the level of satisfaction at the hotel. It has successfully built an undisputed reputation of comfortable stays as well as outstanding cuisines. The hotel rose to fame over the last 8 years and successfully leads F&B offerings and its unique promotion throughout the city…it remains the choice numero uno over higher star ventures.
